News

Parent Council meeting

January 17, 2021 admin

The next meeting of the Parent Council will be on Zoom on Wednesday, 20 January at 7pm.

If you have an issue you would like to raise please email us at enquiries@hyndlandprimaryparentcouncil.org or contact your year rep.  Minutes from previous meeting can be found on their own page, here.
